data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: The Reich President in reply said firmly that he must answer this demand with a clear, unyielding No. He ____ not ____ before God, ____ his ____, ____ before ____ Fatherland ____ transfer ____ the ____ authority ____ government ____ a ____ party, especially ____ a ____ that ____ biased ____ people ____ had ____ views ____ their ____. There were a number of other reasons against it, upon which he did not wish to enlarge in detail, such as fear of increased unrest, the effect on foreign countries, etc.
data.partBlankContent: The Reich President in reply said firmly that he must answer this demand with a clear, unyielding No. He co___ not jus____ before God, bef___ his consc_____, o_ before t__ Fatherland t__ transfer o_ the wh___ authority o_ government t_ a sin___ party, especially t_ a pa___ that w__ biased aga____ people w__ had diff_____ views fr__ their o__. There were a number of other reasons against it, upon which he did not wish to enlarge in detail, such as fear of increased unrest, the effect on foreign countries, etc.
data.fullContent: The Reich President in reply said firmly that he must answer this demand with a clear, unyielding No. He could not justify before God, before his conscience, or before the Fatherland the transfer of the whole authority of government to a single party, especially to a party that was biased against people who had different views from their own. There were a number of other reasons against it, upon which he did not wish to enlarge in detail, such as fear of increased unrest, the effect on foreign countries, etc.
data.answer: 德意志总统坚决地回答说，他必须以明确、坚决的“不”来回答这个要求。他不能当着上帝的面，当着自己的良心的面，或当着祖国的面，为把整个政府权力移交给一个政党辩护，特别是移交给一个对与自己意见不同的人有偏见的政党。反对它的理由还有许多，他不愿详细说明，如担心动乱加剧、对外国的影响等。
